import React,{useEffect,useState}from"react";import{useTranslation}from"react-i18next";import{Link}from"react-router-dom";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const FundList=()=>{const{t}=useTranslation();const[funds,setFunds]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{const fetchFunds=async()=>{try{const response=await fetch("https://shuhao-fosure.onrender.com/api/funds");const data=await response.json();setFunds(data);}catch(error){console.error("Error fetching funds:",error);}};fetchFunds();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:t("fund_list")}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:funds.map(fund=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:`/funds/${fund.fundId}`,children:fund.name})},fund._id))})]});};export default FundList;
